snippet: The N.F.L. stars Robert Griffin III and Darrelle Revis are the latest players to come back quickly from a knee injury that once ended careers.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. stars Robert Griffin III and Darrelle Revis are the latest players to come back quickly from a knee injury that once ended careers.

headline.main: Part of the A.C.L. Family, With the Scars to Show for It
headline.print_headline: Part of the A.C.L. Family, With the Scars to Show for It
